Also interesting is how the author plays on the BBC NTR trope. Instead of the usual boring and racist story of BBC conquering the heart of unwilling women who doesn't have a slick of agency, the cheating wife here is actually the person in power. She is the head of Nishizumi family, a master in Senshado (basically airsoft but with tanks) while Hanisch is just an engineer. She actually have autonomy of her actions and we can see her actively wanting to go out with Hanisch instead the usual cliche of the man constantly coercing or manipulating the women. Basically, instead of relying on the xenophobic Gaijin fear mongering, the author wrote her as simply a nymphomaniac with zero regards to her husband. This just make everything extra lewd and exciting imo.
